notes:
### 🎯 Core changes
- 🟢 **Buy** [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) and [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)
- 🟢 **Buy** [Siphon Gloves](item_099f8177-c2a4-4e13-b321-99349f8b1eb7)
  - Make sure you use Quick Melee all the time for self-sustain
- 🟠 **Buy** [Let’s Go Win](item_80df18f3-8530-4e55-8ea3-9ac7a3f12508)

---
### ⚔️ Playstyle
**Play safe until you find your opening.** You haven't got your wound upgrades yet, so you can't go too crazy. Play patient! Use cover. Fish for an out-of-position squishy with Knife, use Shout to push them, secure the kill, reset Shout, and snowball from there.

### 🎯 Core changes
*Required cash: $6000*
1. 🔵 **Buy** [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6)
    - Build full AP for now - this is a big boost to Knife, Axe, and wound damage
    - Will improve Shout damage once you pick up [Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52) next round
    - [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6)'s price was increased by $500 on May 20, but it's still worth every penny [^nano_cola_nerf] 

---
### 📉 Can't afford core changes?
- **Over $3500:**
  1. **Sell**:
      - 🟢 [Siphon Gloves](item_099f8177-c2a4-4e13-b321-99349f8b1eb7)
      - 🟢 [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7) *(if you still don't have $5500)*
  2. 🔵 **Buy** [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6)

- **Under $3000:**
  - 🟢 **Buy** [Frenzy Amplifier](item_d4b0cfcb-14e9-4472-a688-680120217250)
    - Replace with [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) if [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0) or [Soldier: 76](hero_e1ac7ef5-4648-4998-b8b0-9e3da3e60546) are causing issues

---
### 📈 Spare cash after core changes?
- **Over $8000:**
  1. **Buy** TWO of: 
      - 🔵 [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e)
      - 🔵 [Bigger Magnet](item_c0acbb75-6f00-4736-9bb9-c144e168f511) 
      - 🔵 [Custom Stock](item_17d633af-8bcc-4893-b865-be0a7bc66fe2) 
- Don't be tempted to sell [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6) in favour of [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce) -- keeping it and buying two more blue items gives more, plus some extra buffs, for the same price

- **Under $8000:**
  1. 🔵 **Buy**  [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e)
  2. Top up with green items as cash allows

---
### ⚔️ Playstyle
Same playstyle as round 1: play safe until your opening with Knife.

---
#### Footnotes
[^nano_cola_nerf]: https://overwatch.blizzard.com/en-us/news/patch-notes/live/2025/05/

### 🎯 Core changes
*Required cash: $11000 ([Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52)) or $10000 ([Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8))*
1. **Buy** one of:
    - 🟠 [Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52) (damage-over-time and self-healing)
      - This is the core choice for this build. Choose it if you're not having issues with [Kiriko](hero_70a0ac5c-2a55-4fab-beeb-2f570886426f), [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0), or [Ana](hero_f1aee6cf-704f-455f-a100-ec882ebbe000)
    - 🟠 [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8) (burst damage and overhealth)
      - An *excellent* choice in almost all situations, but into [Kiriko](hero_70a0ac5c-2a55-4fab-beeb-2f570886426f) / [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0) / [Ana](hero_f1aee6cf-704f-455f-a100-ec882ebbe000) (heroes who remove wounds or stop you from healing), it's almost *definitely* better than [Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52) 
      - Note that [Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52) is still playable into these heroes if you buy items like [Rebellious Spirit](item_59d3bff2-ca1f-459e-a450-80e011a10fd2), but it's tricky
      - You're already building AP, so with some small adjustments, both Shout *and* Carnage can be powerhouses at the same time
2. **Buy** one of:
    - 🟣 [Booming Voice](item_d751b552-4c3f-49d6-966b-611096fd2259) (for [Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52))
      - Note that this item **DOES** extend the range of [Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52), despite [Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52)'s description specifying a static 10 meters
    - 🟣 [Scav Scraps](item_b24d8c46-7022-49e2-b50d-7cc20a27fb05) (for [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8))
      - [Ana](hero_f1aee6cf-704f-455f-a100-ec882ebbe000)'s grenade doesn't stop you gaining overhealth, and two Carnage charges can be enough to burst through [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0)'s bubbles
    - [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce) is another option if you have enough cash for it, but don't sell core items for it
      - On May 20, [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce) was nerfed: its price was increased $500 and its AP was reduced by 5. This means *much* worse value for money. IMO, it's no longer the best item to pick here, but it's still an option if you want raw damage or have cash out the wazoo [^champions_kit_nerf]

---
### 📉 Can't afford core changes?
- **Over $8500 ([Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52)) / $7500 ([Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8)):**
    1. 🟢 **Sell** [Siphon Gloves](item_099f8177-c2a4-4e13-b321-99349f8b1eb7), then, if needed, [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)
    2. 🟣 **Buy** your purple item from the *Core changes* section
    3. Top up with green items (see *Over $1500* section)

- **Under $8500 ([Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52)) / $7500 ([Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8)):**
    1. 🔵 **Buy** [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e) 
    2. Top up with green items (see *Over $1500* section)

---
### 📈 Spare cash after core changes?
- **Over $4000:**
    1. 🔵 **Buy** [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e) 
    2. Top up with green items (see *Over $1500* section)

- **Under $4000:**
    1. **Buy** as many as you can from: 
        - 🟢 [Frenzy Amplifier](item_d4b0cfcb-14e9-4472-a688-680120217250) 
        - 🟢 [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) 
        - 🟢 [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) 

---
### ⚔️ Playstyle
- [Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52):
  - Applies wound to all enemies in Shout radius
  - This changes the playstyle quite a bit. You're not just giving your team speed and overhealth anymore: you're on your way to becoming a wound-applying monster. From now on, it's important to get on top of enemies and *then* use Shout -- the more enemies you hit, the more you heal
  - Late-game, you'll heal for a *lot* (like, hundreds) when you wound 5 enemies at once. Don't forget that wounds stack, so be sure to be using Carnage and Quick Melee to double up where you can
- [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8):
  - Gives Carnage (axe) another charge
  - This is great for burst damage and for farming overhealth. One Carnage and a melee is sometimes enough to kill a squishy alone, but two in a row will definitely finish the job
  - **Tip:** hold the Quick Melee button during (and for a moment after) Carnage: this animation cancels and queues a melee to hit at the first available frame

---
#### Footnotes
[^champions_kit_nerf]: https://overwatch.blizzard.com/en-us/news/patch-notes/live/2025/05/

### 🎯 Core changes
*Required cash: $10500 ([Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52)) / $10000 ([Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8))*
1.  **Buy** one of:
    - 🟣 [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) (for [Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52))
      - All abilities (including Shout!) now apply healing reduction, which is incredible
      - This triggers on every damage tick from Shout, so you apply healing reduction for the entire 3 second duration of [Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52), then 3 more seconds after the last tick. One Shout provides *6 seconds* of healing reduction, *and* it resets with [Let’s Go Win](item_80df18f3-8530-4e55-8ea3-9ac7a3f12508) 
    - 🟣 [Undying Loyalty](item_d0278c35-8006-4c8d-8f02-4fd0217fd3e2) (for [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8))
      - Has a similar effect to [Thrill of Battle](item_80ed7f65-e015-4dbb-ada0-fb8fa9b9b086), which you'll be missing out on with the [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8) variant
      - Replace this with  [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8) if  [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0) or [Soldier: 76](hero_e1ac7ef5-4648-4998-b8b0-9e3da3e60546) are causing big issues

---
### 📉 Can't afford core changes?
- **Over $8000 ([Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52)) / $7500 ([Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8)):**
  1. 🟢 **Sell** [Siphon Gloves](item_099f8177-c2a4-4e13-b321-99349f8b1eb7), then, if needed, [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)
  2. 🟣 **Buy** your purple item from the *Core changes* section

- **Under $8000 ([Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52)) / $7500 ([Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8)):**
  1. **Buy** as many as you can from the *Over $4000* section

### 📈 Spare cash after core changes?
- **Over $4000:**
  1. **Buy** as many as you can from: 
      - Generally good / snowball:
        - 🔵 [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e)
        - 🔵 [Bigger Magnet](item_c0acbb75-6f00-4736-9bb9-c144e168f511) 
        - 🔵 [Custom Stock](item_17d633af-8bcc-4893-b865-be0a7bc66fe2)
      - Anti-counter items (buy only if specific heroes are causing issues):
        - 🔵 [Rebellious Spirit](item_59d3bff2-ca1f-459e-a450-80e011a10fd2) -- [Kiriko](hero_70a0ac5c-2a55-4fab-beeb-2f570886426f),  [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0), [Moira](hero_7fb6ff1e-a193-40c0-bd0a-25c1928fbaed) (if she has  [Voidhoppers](item_d4ce0c76-2500-40d6-b066-dca303be097f))
        - 🔵 [Dez’s Damage Dampeners](item_d55fc98b-d014-4383-903c-a7aa1fb7c619) -- [Orisa](hero_91644d44-1093-4f62-ac51-020975465e85),  [Lucio](hero_b38c5d54-a585-4545-b0b8-4d4b205b3768)
        - 🔵 [Vital-E-Tee](item_b92e6f1d-3aac-4eec-b027-00c8e1529016) -- [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0),  [Soldier: 76](hero_e1ac7ef5-4648-4998-b8b0-9e3da3e60546)

- **Under $4000:**
    1. 🟢 **Sell** [Siphon Gloves](item_099f8177-c2a4-4e13-b321-99349f8b1eb7), then, if still under $4000, [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)
    2. 🔵 **Buy** [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e)

round_upgrades.notes: This item is bugged (this benefits you) - despite what Reckoner's Roar says (that it wounds in a static 10m range), these items DO work together to increase wound range

notes:
### 🎯 Core changes
*Required cash: $12500*
1. **Buy** one of:
    - [Reckoner’s Roar](item_efe615c6-8b32-4847-9d8f-4f55adaeba52) if you don't have it yet
    - [Thrill of Battle](item_80ed7f65-e015-4dbb-ada0-fb8fa9b9b086) otherwise
2. 🟢 **Sell**  [Siphon Gloves](item_099f8177-c2a4-4e13-b321-99349f8b1eb7)
3. 🟣 **Buy**  [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce)
    - Even though this item was nerfed, I still think it's the best option this round, as otherwise our AP gets a bit stagnant
    - If you can't afford it but still need damage, buy [Catalytic Crystal](item_3e3f4f77-cdf8-4dda-a5b0-2fb9390aefc4) or [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e) 
    - For a tankier build with less damage, buy [Undying Loyalty](item_d0278c35-8006-4c8d-8f02-4fd0217fd3e2) or [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8)

---
### 📉 Can't afford core changes?
- **Over $11500:**
    1. 🟢 **Sell** [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7) (see above: [Siphon Gloves](item_099f8177-c2a4-4e13-b321-99349f8b1eb7) should already be sold)
    2. 🟣 **Buy**  [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce)

- **Under $11500:**
  1. **Buy** as many as you can from: 
      - Generally good / snowball:
        - 🔵 [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e)
        - 🔵 [Bigger Magnet](item_c0acbb75-6f00-4736-9bb9-c144e168f511) 
        - 🔵 [Custom Stock](item_17d633af-8bcc-4893-b865-be0a7bc66fe2)
      - Anti-counter items (buy only if specific heroes are causing issues):
        - 🔵 [Rebellious Spirit](item_59d3bff2-ca1f-459e-a450-80e011a10fd2) -- [Kiriko](hero_70a0ac5c-2a55-4fab-beeb-2f570886426f),  [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0), [Moira](hero_7fb6ff1e-a193-40c0-bd0a-25c1928fbaed) (if she has  [Voidhoppers](item_d4ce0c76-2500-40d6-b066-dca303be097f))
        - 🔵 [Dez’s Damage Dampeners](item_d55fc98b-d014-4383-903c-a7aa1fb7c619) -- [Orisa](hero_91644d44-1093-4f62-ac51-020975465e85),  [Lucio](hero_b38c5d54-a585-4545-b0b8-4d4b205b3768)
        - 🔵 [Vital-E-Tee](item_b92e6f1d-3aac-4eec-b027-00c8e1529016) -- [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0),  [Soldier: 76](hero_e1ac7ef5-4648-4998-b8b0-9e3da3e60546)
  2. If over $3000 but under $4000: 
      1. 🟢 **Sell** [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)
      2. **Buy** another item from the list above


### 📈 Spare cash after core changes?
See *Under $11500* section and buy from there.

---
### ⚔️ Playstyle
[Thrill of Battle](item_80ed7f65-e015-4dbb-ada0-fb8fa9b9b086)  makes wounds heal nearby allies. Your ability rotation might look something like this:
- Get near enemies
- Shout to apply wounds, which damage enemies, heal you, and heal your team
- Push your advantage (hard!) to secure an elim and a Shout cooldown reset 
- Shout again (to keep fighting or to back out safely)

If possible, communicate to your team that they can stay near you for passive healing (especially if you have [Undying Loyalty](item_d0278c35-8006-4c8d-8f02-4fd0217fd3e2)).

round_upgrades.notes: Or Reckoner's Roar if you have Chop Chop
This item is bugged (this benefits you) - despite what Reckoner's Roar says (that it wounds in a static 10m range), these items DO work together to increase wound range

notes:
### 🎯 Core changes
*Required cash: $9000 - $10000*
1. **Buy**  one of: 
    - 🟠 **Highly, highly recommended:** [Bow Down](item_0673e9ed-37dd-4e58-acef-77e0fbe613fb) for empowered ultimates (be careful of a [Kiriko](hero_70a0ac5c-2a55-4fab-beeb-2f570886426f) with [Two-Zu](item_80f16d3e-a4c0-4fa8-90b1-a0f033a1a77b) or a [Moira](hero_7fb6ff1e-a193-40c0-bd0a-25c1928fbaed) with [Voidhoppers](item_d4ce0c76-2500-40d6-b066-dca303be097f), as they can cleanse your ultimate)
      - You can offset some of this risk by hard focusing the problem hero while they're stunned by [Bow Down](item_0673e9ed-37dd-4e58-acef-77e0fbe613fb) 
    - 🟠 [Bloodcrazed](item_9ac9b9a7-793d-4f2f-9447-4b55ba7bc3f5) for more overhealth, allowing aggressive plays
    - 🟠 [Twist the Knife](item_860863ec-dc87-491d-8a7b-087fbf219446) for a safe, simple buff that extends wound duration
- 🟢 **Sell**  [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418)
- **Buy**  one of:
  - 🟣 [Catalytic Crystal](item_3e3f4f77-cdf8-4dda-a5b0-2fb9390aefc4) if you're playing [Bow Down](item_0673e9ed-37dd-4e58-acef-77e0fbe613fb) and are managing to stay alive
    - [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e) is okay if you already have [Catalytic Crystal](item_3e3f4f77-cdf8-4dda-a5b0-2fb9390aefc4) and definitely don't need tankiness
  - 🟣 [Undying Loyalty](item_d0278c35-8006-4c8d-8f02-4fd0217fd3e2) or [Gloomgauntlet](item_76cb8fe3-3c1f-4769-a1ec-a9c2dc510ba7) if you need tankiness 
  - If you chose [Twist the Knife](item_860863ec-dc87-491d-8a7b-087fbf219446), you have more flexibility - pick any purple item that provides AP, health, or armor (whichever you feel you need)

---
### 📉 Can't afford core changes?
- **Over $9000:**
    1. 🔵 **Sell** [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6) 
    2. 🟣 **Buy** one of the purple items listed in *Buys and sells*
    3. 🟢 **Buy** a cheap item to fill up the last slot (probably [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418))

- **Under $9000:**
    1. 🟢 **Buy** a cheap item to fill up the last slot (such as  [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418))

### 📈 Spare cash after core changes?
- **Over $4000:**
    1. 🔵 **Sell** [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6) 
    2. 🟣 **Buy** a purple item from the *Core changes* section


---
### ⚔️ Playstyle
[Bow Down](item_0673e9ed-37dd-4e58-acef-77e0fbe613fb) stuns everyone you hit with Rampage. [Catalytic Crystal](item_3e3f4f77-cdf8-4dda-a5b0-2fb9390aefc4) gives you more Rampages. 

Final rotation looks something like: Knife - Shout - kill - reset Shout, Shout again - snowball. Ult whenever it's available and you have backup.

Make sure to focus cleansers like [Kiriko](hero_70a0ac5c-2a55-4fab-beeb-2f570886426f) and [Moira](hero_7fb6ff1e-a193-40c0-bd0a-25c1928fbaed) while they're stunned, before they have time to use [Two-Zu](item_80f16d3e-a4c0-4fa8-90b1-a0f033a1a77b) or  [Voidhoppers](item_d4ce0c76-2500-40d6-b066-dca303be097f)!

Good luck!

round_upgrades.notes: Or Reckoner's Roar if you have Chop Chop
If you have Bow Down and Catalytic Crystal
This item is bugged (this benefits you) - despite what Reckoner's Roar says (that it wounds in a static 10m range), these items DO work together to increase wound range
